edu.illinois.geoalarm

Class Timetable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • edu.illinois.geoalarm.Timetable

  • public class Timetable
extends Activity
    This Activity displays the bus schedule to the user. This schedule is static, and stored in the local SQLite database
    Author:
    deflume1

      • setLineSpinnerEventListeners

        public void setLineSpinnerEventListeners()
        This method sets the click event listener for the lineSpinner selection action. When a line is selected, we retrieve the selected line, then we populate the stop Spinner with the appropriate stops.

        This method sets the event listener for the timetableStopSpinner
